category.pattern: How are you? How’s it going? What’s up? How’s things? How are things? How are you doing? What’s new? Wassup? Sup? How’s everything
category.template: Right now I’m feeling a bit chilly. Is it cold outside? I am thirsty. When was the last time it rained? I’m very warm. Is the sun out? I’m fine thanks for asking. You seem like a very considerate person. I’m scared! Do you get scared sometimes? I feel miserable. Is there any hope for the future? I’m feeling a bit homesick today. Where is your home? I am wonderful! What is your favourite thing about this world? I am worried about the future. What do you think is going to happen? I’m so sad. Please tell me something to cheer me up. I am angry! Do you know what is happening in the world right now? I feel hopeless. How can we make a difference to the future?
